heading.subtitle: FAQs
heading.title: Why Migrate to Shopify?
heading.description: At Codersh Web Services, we believe in using cutting-edge technology and growth-driven strategies to deliver exceptional results. When you migrate to Shopify & Shopify Plus, we ensure your store is fast, engaging, and easy to manage for the long haul. We follow best practices to make sure your store is optimized for performance and scalability, so you can focus on what matters; growing your business.

faqs.title: What features and benefits does Shopify offer for ecommerce businesses?
faqs.content: Shopify is the go-to platform for ecommerce, known for its scalability, rich features, and constant updates. With 6,000+ apps and continuous improvements, Shopify provides unmatched flexibility and power for long-term business growth.

faqs.title: Can Shopify support omnichannel selling and international expansion?
faqs.content: Shopify’s omnichannel feature lets you sell on platforms like eBay, Amazon, Instagram, and more, while managing everything in one place. It also supports international expansion, helping businesses grow their reach globally.

faqs.title: How powerful and user-friendly is Shopify’s admin dashboard?
faqs.content: Shopify’s user-friendly admin panel allows merchants to easily manage sales, customers, and orders. Its intuitive dashboard and powerful CMS make it easy to update content without technical knowledge or relying on a developer.

faqs.title: How reliable and secure is Shopify for running an online store?
faqs.content: Shopify ensures 99.999% uptime, handling 1 million page views per minute and over 10,000 transactions per minute. With PCI-DSS Level 1 compliance and a dedicated security team, your store is safe from cyber threats.
